<title level="1" right="Rules">[Steps 1 and 2](/Rules.aspx?ID=2056)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 28 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Adam is making his first Pathfinder character. After talking about it with the rest of the group, he's decided to make a [dwarf](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=59) [druid](/Classes.aspx?ID=34). After jotting down a few ideas, he begins by writing down a +0 for each attribute modifier.
</column>
